metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Shivers is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Shivers is written in the key of G♯ Dorian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 11st most popular key among Dorian keys and     the 47th most popular  among all keys. The G♯ Dorian scale is similar to the G♯ Minor scale except that its 6th note is a half step higher (E♯).  Chord progressions in Dorian have a characteristic sound due to the major quality of the chord built on the 4th scale degree. 

See the G♯ Dorian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
